Morning.title: Morning Dhikr
Morning.translation: Glory be to Allah and praise be to Him.

Morning.title: Morning Supplication
Morning.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بِكَ أَصْبَحْنَا وَبِكَ أَمْسَيْنَا وَبِكَ نَحْيَا وَبِكَ نَمُوتُ وَإِلَيْكَ النُّشُورُ
Morning.translation: O Allah, by You we enter the morning, and by You we enter the evening, and by You we live, and by You we die, and to You is the final return.

Morning.title: Protection from Evil
Morning.arabic: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
Morning.translation: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.

Evening.title: Evening Dhikr
Evening.translation: O Allah, save me from the Fire.

Evening.title: Evening Supplication
Evening.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بِكَ أَمْسَيْنَا وَبِكَ أَصْبَحْنَا وَبِكَ نَحْيَا وَبِكَ نَمُوتُ وَإِلَيْكَ الْمَصِيرُ
Evening.translation: O Allah, by You we enter the evening, and by You we enter the morning, and by You we live, and by You we die, and to You is the destination.

Before Eating.title: Before Meal
Before Eating.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ لَنَا فِيهِ وَأَطْعِمْنَا خَيْرًا مِنْهُ
Before Eating.translation: O Allah, bless it for us and feed us with what is better than it.

After Eating.title: Alhamdulillah
After Eating.translation: All praise is due to Allah.

After Eating.title: After Meal
After Eating.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَطْعَمَنَا وَسَقَانَا وَجَعَلَنَا مُسْلِمِينَ
After Eating.translation: Praise be to Allah who fed us and gave us drink and made us Muslims.

Travel.title: Travel Supplication
Travel.arabic: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُ مُقْرِنِينَ وَإِنَّا إِلَى رَبِّنَا لَمُنْقَلِبُونَ
Travel.translation: Glory to Him who has subjected this to us, and we could never have it. And indeed, to our Lord we will return.

Seeking Forgiveness.title: Istighfar
Seeking Forgiveness.arabic: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَتُبْ عَلَيَّ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيمُ
Seeking Forgiveness.translation: My Lord, forgive me and accept my repentance. You are the Accepter of Repentance, the Merciful.

Entering Home.title: Entering Home
Entering Home.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ الْمَوْلِجِ وَخَيْرَ الْمَخْرَجِ بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَلَجْنَا وَبِسْمِ اللَّهِ خَرَجْنَا
Entering Home.translation: O Allah, I ask You for the best entry and the best exit. In the name of Allah we enter, and in the name of Allah we exit.

Leaving Home.title: Leaving Home
Leaving Home.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللَّهِ وَلَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ
Leaving Home.translation: In the name of Allah, I place my trust in Allah. There is no power and no strength except with Allah.
